local_intent: Perceive the T-block and precisely approach/align to it (±0.5 cm) before continuing the transfer.
coherence_with_global: Implements the micro-goal in the transfer phase by detecting the block, running ApproachAndAlign(t_block, 0.005, 1200), and verifying proximity with IsAt. Aligns with the global plan’s perceive → align steps prior to pushing.
